attributes.review: Going through this app I found that it collects our information and sells it to China. No way my president would do this. Please mr. trump fix this
attributes.title: I love trump but this app is dangerous

attributes.review: I had to open this app to see a racist orange man 🍊 👨. My eyes were bleeding. I had to get rushed to the ER, I practically died‼️These are just some of the reasons I’m rating this a one ☝🏽 star ⭐️ ugh 😾🖕🏽!
attributes.title: ALMOST DIED 😾

attributes.review: Deleting this ASAP. It caused me to lash out on my non existent children and husband. I yeeted my non existent dog out the window. Don’t get unless you want to suffer this fate or something worse
attributes.title: Eww🤢🤮

attributes.review: this app is TERRIBLE, it wasted my data downloading for the entire day and glitched my phone out so badly that i had to go buy a new one. DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.userName: apple just give me my name
